about_the_game:
Dive into the relentless void of the dark side of the Moon, where survival hangs by a thread and danger lurks in every shadow. You are the lone astronaut tasked with stabilizing the Unified Field Reactor, but its rampant energy surges have fractured time and space itself. Lunar storms rage, meteor showers rain destruction, and reality twists unpredictably as alien creatures, rogue drones, and sinister androids swarm the surface. With oxygen depleting and your equipment scattered across treacherous terrain, you’ll fight to stay alive while braving radiation storms and securing life-saving resources. Every step is a calculated risk as you scavenge for high-tech weaponry—laser pistols, jet rocket guns, and more—to combat threats that care nothing for your mission objectives.

Each of the three gameplay episodes delivers over 30 intense, action-packed missions that test your resilience and ingenuity. Whether racing against the clock to replenish your oxygen, enduring environmental onslaughts, or eliminating nightmarish hostiles, every mission pushes your survival instincts to their limits. Navigate the desolate lunar landscape, find shelter amid chaos, and turn scavenged tools into your greatest allies. The dark side of the Moon is not just a battleground—it’s a puzzle of survival, and the only way out is through skill, strategy, and unrelenting determination. Are you ready to embrace the cosmic unknown?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 3350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 64 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or DirectX 12 compatible graphics card
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: When scientists resumed their Unified Field Theory experiments this time they succeeded- with devastating consequences. You are trapped on a desolate Lunar Base with only your wits, real world astronaut weapons and a heads up display to give you instructions.
